choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction: Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews

### Response:

Here is a healthy meal plan for you that takes into consideration your dietary restrictions. This plan provides balanced nutrition over the course of one week (seven days). The menu has been carefully crafted to exclude common allergens and food intolerances, while still providing delicious and satisfying options.
### Day 1: Breakfast - Oatmeal with dried cranberries and walnuts; Lunch - Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (no garlic or onions); Dinner - Baked fish fillets, steamed broccoli, and a side of quinoa.
### Day 2: Breakfast - Scrambled eggs with diced tomatoes, green peppers, and mushrooms; Lunch - Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (no garlic or onions); Dinner - Baked fish fillets, steamed broccoli, and a side of quinoa.
